projects.name: CodeBook
projects.description: Using an online course, we created CodeBook, a mockup website that allows visitors to browse available eBooks. Users can find books with search or use filters such as best seller and ratings to find the right book. Once they find the right one(s), users can add selection to a cart and purchase them either by creating and logging into their account or as a guest. Once they purchase, they can access a dashboard to see their purchases.
projects.technology: React Router, useState, useEffect, useConttext and useReducer.

projects.name: Cinemate
projects.description: Cinemate allows the visitor to browse the most popular and upcoming movies with a brief description. The user can click on a movie poster to get additional information about the films.
projects.technology: React Router, Redux, useState, useEffect, useConttext and useReducer.

projects.name: Shopmate
projects.description: Shopmate is a shopping cart that allows the user to browse products and add them to a cart to purchase.
projects.technology: React Router, useState, useEffect, useConttext and useReducer.

projects.name: Taskmate
projects.description: Taskmate allows the user to create a task and see a list of task to be completed. The user can edit a task and delete a task once it is completed.
projects.technology: React Router, useState, useEffect, useConttext and useReducer.
